title: Maokai skin idea! (or Maokat?)
body:
So this might be really silly but when I first saw Maokai in game I definitely thought that he was throwing cats and not saplings!

BUT then I thought that could be a good skin? 

Maokai doesn't have any fun/goofy skins yet so maybe there could be one with him throwing cats (because cats get stuck up trees) OR if this is a bit too abstract/not detailed enough maybe he could be like a crazy cat lady in a nightie and slippers with his tree hair in curlers hurling cats at evil passers by?

Sadly I can't draw to save my life so there's no example of what's in my head but yeah...

This is just a thought that I've had for a while :)

replies.body: I like the idea of cat stuck in a tee, seems like a no brainer that should have happened a while ago.
How about we go all the way and give {{champion:57}} a skin where he's a living cat tree?

If anyone is getting a cat based skin, it should be Yorick.
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3815890&highlight=yorick+the+crazy
